pages.text: The Flux Inhaler is the inverse of the $(l:blasters)Flux Blaster$().  Instead of pushing energy to the 8 blocks in front of it, the Inhaler will pull energy from them.  The Flux Inhaler will not push energy, so another block, such as the $(l:fluxhopper)Flux Hopper$() must be used to pull the inhaled energy.
